file_content.text: You have an interesting way of dressing yourself. Must be from the Outer Rim.
You were just going to fly away without saying goodbye, weren't you?
What are you doing here?
Azalie?
I tracked down your docking bay number. I knew you'd come back here eventually.
Goodbye. See? I said it.
I'll say it now.
How can you mock me like that, after....
I thought I got rid of you.
That was the plan.
"Got rid" of me? Am I something disposable to you?
Didn't the hours we spent together mean anything to you?
Those were some of the best hours of my life.
Of course it did.
Then why are you avoiding me? We should be together.
It's getting so hard to keep track of you girls.
That was you?
Don't be stupid.
You awful man! You used me!
What do you think of me now, hmm? Have anything to say for yourself?
If I hurt your feelings, I apologize.
I'm sorry, Azalie.
You're sorry, I'm sorry--the whole galaxy's sorry! It doesn't change anything unless you want to be together.
I don't want you getting hurt.
It's too dangerous.
I... I understand. You lead a dangerous life, don't you?
You wanted to protect me, and it was too painful to say goodbye. That's what you're trying to tell me?
This is for the best. Trust me.
Yes.
I--I'll miss you. Take care of yourself.
Sure, that works.
If I say "yes," will you go away and never come back?
Anything to get rid of you.
I was wrong about you. You're just like all the other scum on Nar Shaddaa.
We'll always have Nar Shaddaa, sweetheart.
We're not meant to be.
We should have had more. Goodbye.
Go back to your suite, and I'll bring you gifts.
[Lie] Let me win you back.
You... you're going to buy me presents? That's so romantic!
You wonderful man! I can't wait to see my gifts!
What we had isn't worth all this drama.
You're upset over nothing.
You're right. You're not worth anything.
You'll be dead before you pull the trigger.
I'll kill you.
You'd do it, wouldn't you? You'd really kill me.
I've made a terrible mistake... I wish I'd never met you!
Do you mind? I'm talking with important people.
There's a connection between us. I can feel it, can't you?
Are you alright? Did that horrible man hurt you?
That wasn't the first bounty hunter I've fought.
Relax, I'm fine.
You're amazing. I've never met anyone like you.
I've got some bruises that could use kissing.
[Flirt] A little.
We'll have to see what we can do about that.
Beat it, little girl.
Hello again. Where did you get off to?
I had some business to take care of.
Just running errands.
Making myself more presentable for you.
[Flirt] Cleaning up.
Why? You look wonderful.
Don't ask.
No, of course not. I'm just glad to see you.
Father finished introducing me to Drooga. I'm glad that formality is over.
Drooga stared at me the whole time. Never said a word, only licked his lips. It made me so uncomfortable.
How creepy.
I suppose I shouldn't judge. He's the first Hutt I've met. Maybe that's normal?
Maybe your beauty stunned him into silence?
[Flirt] I can't blame him.
You think I'm beautiful?
Drooga obviously has a big crush on you.
The Hutt thinks you're cute.
Don't be ridiculous. I'm a human. He's a Hutt. How would that even work?
Is it getting warm in here? Oh my. I can hardly breathe.
Is there someplace else I can take you?
Do you need help?
We could get away, just the two of us.
[Flirt] Let's leave.
Really? I'd... I'd love that.
I have my own private suite. It's quiet and comfortable. We could go there.
Sure, I guess.
I'm right behind you, gorgeous.
[Flirt] Lead the way.
Uh, I'll hang around down here. You have fun, Captain.
Follow me....
Goodness. That was... unexpected. We hardly know each other. I've never done that before.
Thanks for the thrills, Azalie.
You showed me a good time.
Thrills? I hope that's not all it was. I feel a connection between us. Don't you?
You're cute for expecting me to believe that.
I don't believe you.
I'm being serious. This was very special.
I'd better explain my absence to father. I'll see you again soon.
Probably because you kiss like a Mon Calamari.
That explains a lot.
What? I've been told I'm a very good kisser by lots and lots of... nevermind.
You think I'd go anywhere with a floozy like you?
Forget it, you tart.
Floozy? How dare you!
That's so rude! And to think, I was starting to like you!
Maybe you should go lie down, little girl. This is a grown-up party.
Lightweight.
Excuse me....
I look forward to seeing you later.
I've never seen anyone talk back to a Hutt like that. You're not afraid of anything.
I can't believe what you did to those Kaleesh. You're the bravest man I've ever met.
That's why everyone calls me "Fearless."
I'm famous for my bravery.
I was just trying to impress you, sweetheart.
[Flirt] Glad you liked that.
This party has been a lot more exciting since you walked in.
My name's Azalie. My father owns a corporation on Corellia. He and Drooga are partners.
What kind of business are they in?
Partners in what?
Something to do with starships, I think? All I know is, father needed to be here.
The only person I'm interested in hearing about is you.
[Flirt] Enough about them.
Me? There's not much to tell. This is my first time here.
I thought Nar Shaddaa would be more glamorous. I haven't met anyone I'd consider pleasant company until now.
If I didn't know any better, I'd say you were trying to charm me.
Are you flirting?
I... well, I... have you tried the fizzy blue drinks? They're delicious.
I feel the same way, Azalie.
[Flirt] Likewise.
You're very sweet. Not like these other people at all.
Go away, kid. You bother me.
You're kind of dumb.
Sorry I can't stay and chat.
Of course. I'm busy, too.
Father asked me to pay my respects to Drooga. I hope I see you again later.
Excuse me, but I think I see someone more interesting.
I'm already bored with you.
How rude.
Have you tried the blue fizzy drinks? Make my head feel like it's full of shimmersilk....
I can't eat or drink half the things served here because they're poisonous to humans....
